burgers.name: Double Patty Cheeseburger
burgers.description: Double Patty cheessburgers come with two 3oz patty's, American cheese and your choice of sauce on a sesame seed milk bun.
burgers.ingredients: two 3oz patty's, american cheese, sesame seed milk bun

burgers.name: Original
burgers.description: Our burgers are made with our signiture blend of premium AAA beef cutes, delivered fresh each weel and ground in-house daily.
burgers.ingredients: AAA beef, sweet onion, american cheese, house pickles, potato roll

burgers.name: Impossible Burger
burgers.ingredients: Impossible Burger, american cheese, tomatoes, pickles, lettuce, secret sauce, martin's potato roll

burgers.name: The Bulldozer
burgers.ingredients: lamb, havarti, mango salsa, jalapeno, chipotle aioli

burgers.name: The Kumasi Burger
burgers.description: Pop-up. Named after the city in Ghana where owner Chieff Bosompra's father is from
burgers.ingredients: american cheese, lettuce, tomato, Lucy sauce
